title: check out this apologetic response lol

embed.description: Read Psalms 137:9 commentary using John Gill's Exposition of the Bible. Study the bible online using commentary on Psalms 137:9 and more!

body:
i quoted psalms 139:9 to a guy in a thread that has been deleted.  this was his response lol.  

bashing babys brains out on the rocks isnt revenge, oh no, it is divine justice!
